PropName: Aniphilistes, Keeper of the Secret Hoard
MouseOverText: This mage is pale and wretched-looking, and has a mad gleam in his eyes; the purple of his robes only increases the pallor of his skin.
One of the few hardy folk who make the isolated town of Drawn Swords their home.
This feral-looking man looks one-third man, one-third beast, and one-third devil or demon, though he is undoubtedly all human.  He stares at you blankly.
This young man is very tall, and has a placid, benign countenance.
This mage is pale and wretched-looking, and has a mad gleam in his eyes; the purple of his robes only increases the pallor of his skin.
Clad for battle in the dark hues of the worshippers of Cyric, this fanatical cleric has certainly witnessed the murder of many.
Because he worships Cyric, this man's helmet most likely hides a face that rarely shows compassion, remorse, or love.
A necromancer devoted to Cyric, the Black Sun.
One of the few hardy folk who make the isolated town of Drawn Swords their home.
This moon elf has a fierce, commanding look to him.
This impressive, silvery-white stallion looks to be a Cormyrean Destrier, a breed of warhorse that originated in Cormyr and is prized throughout western Faerun for its strength and beauty.
Pale and somewhat gaunt and hollow-eyed, this moon elf seems rather melancholy.
Pale and somewhat gaunt and hollow-eyed, this moon elf seems rather melancholy.
One of the few hardy folk who make the isolated town of Drawn Swords their home.

She has a placid but not untroubled countenance, and a way of carrying herself that is both gracious and haughty.  She would seem cold if her eyes did not shine and smile, as if she were aware of some joyful secret.
Lorimer Whitefriar is dressed in the familiar armor of a Knight of the Ruby Rose.
Maerdred Varasalis is dressed in the familiar armor of a Knight of the Ruby Rose.
Slimmer and slighter than his brother Vroman, Manfred nevertheless carries himself with a confidence that makes him seem the more imposing of the two.
A boyish, handsome sort of arrogance and command radiate from this man.  He hsa the stature and presence of a born leader, but his eyes glint with the rashness and malice of a tyrant.
A noble-looking elf, clad in chainmail, stands in front of the bar of the Sword and Dragon Inn.
A spectral knight clad in an antique suit of armor; though you cannot see his face, his presence fills you with a sense of despair.
This git of an elf has a severe, mocking countenance.  Laughter always appears to be on her face, but it is of the hateful kind that only comes at someone else's expense.
A grim-, sadistic-, but handsome-looking man with slicked back hair and a cruel curl to his lips.
Valeria Feirbeis is dressed in the familiar armor of a Knight of the Ruby Rose.
Clad for battle in the ominous colors of Zhentil Keep, this cleric of Bane poses a grim threat.
Clad for battle in the ominous colors of Zhentil Keep, this guard poses a grim threat.
This archer is dressed in light chainmail, and wears the colors of Zhentil Keep.
This black-clad mage possesses an air of scornful confidence.
This man looks slightly less rugged than the other folk of Drawn Swords, perhaps because of his nicely made hat and finer clothes.
